file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-18-08-04 - SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the window of the side-hinged main door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - 52-18-08-000-801-A HINGED MAIN DOOR REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE- SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - IN- 52-18-08-400-801-A HINGED MAIN DOOR STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-18-08 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-08-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 2. SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the window of the side-hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the side-hinged main door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door 1 Helps the other technician Side-hinged main door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the side-hinged main door. (2) Remove lining panel of side-hinged main door. Refer to AMM MPP 06-45-00/100. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (1) ( 4 positions) and washers (2) (4 positions). (2) Remove the retainer (3) ( 4 positions). (3) Remove the pane (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-18-08 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR Window - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 811 DET. A FWD 4. PANE 3. RETAINER (4) 2. WASHER (4) 1. SCREW (4) DET. B 145AMM520182.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-18-08 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-18-08-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH SIDE-HINGED MAIN DOOR 3. SIDE-HINGED MAIN-DOOR WINDOW - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the window of the side-hinged main door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-45-00/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION SRM 51-20-01 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Work stand To get access to the side-hinged main door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MIL S - 81733 Type II -2 Sealant P/S 870B-2 AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Side-hinged main door 1 Helps the other technician Side-hinged main door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Remove all the old aerodynamic sealant and prepare the surface ( SRM 51-20-01) . Use a plastic spatula for this. (2) Put the pane (4) in its frame in the door. (3) Install the screws (1) (4 positions), and washers (2) (4 positions) and put the retainer (3) (4 positions) in position to attach the pane (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-18-08 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Apply new aerodynamic sealant (SRM 51-20-01). (2) Install the lining panels of the side-hinged main door ( AMM MPP 06-45-00/100). (3) Close the side-hinged main door. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-18-08 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
